content: directions are for size small changes for sizes medium large and 1x are in parentheses to fit bust 30-32 34-36 38-40 42-44 finished bust 37 40 43 47 gauge 6 shells = 5 12 row = 5 in body pattern with larger hook this pattern was previously available at moda dea 1 website 1 https //web archive org/web/20081220235344/http //www modadea com/patterns/lm0295 htm
